Articles.Content: It would be cool to have a "kuiper belt" around kerbol(sun). The kuiper belt would be a resource heavy place where you would have tons of minerals this belt would be between dres and eeloo. The rocks would be quite close together as Kerbol is very small. the kuiper belt could be a challenge to get to eeloo and jool making it alot harder to get to that planet with all the asteroids in the way.
I love this idea but rendering a whole load of asteroids and rocks would seriously clock up game memory as soon as you get near it, wouldn't it?

As much as I do agree an asteroid belt would be great to have but this has already been suggested and discussed countless times.

That's also the reason it has been placed on the what not to suggest list.
As Tex said, this topic has been suggested many times, is known to the devs and has ended up on the what not to suggest list. Thread locked
